    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">meta</span> <span class="hljs-attr">http-equiv</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"Content-Type"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">content</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"text/html; charset=UTF-8"</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">title</span>&gt;</span>Change Log<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">title</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">head</span>&gt;</span>
  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">body</span> <span class="hljs-attr">bgcolor</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"white"</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">style</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"float:right"</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"README.html"</span>&gt;</span>README<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>

    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h1</span>&gt;</span>Known Issues<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h1</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">ul</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Perl formatting is really crappy.  Partly because the author is lazy and
      partly because Perl is
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"http://www.perlmonks.org/?node_id=663393"</span>&gt;</span>hard<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span> to parse.
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>On some browsers, <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>&amp;lt;code&amp;gt;<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span> elements with newlines in the text
      which use CSS to specify <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>white-space:pre<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span> will have the newlines
      improperly stripped if the element is not attached to the document at the time
      the stripping is done.  Also, on IE 6, all newlines will be stripped from
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>&amp;lt;code&amp;gt;<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span> elements because of the way IE6 produces
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>innerHTML<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>.  Workaround: use <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>&amp;lt;pre&amp;gt;<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span> for code with
      newlines.
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">ul</span>&gt;</span>

    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h1</span>&gt;</span>Change Log<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h1</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">h2</span>&gt;</span>29 March 2007<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">h2</span>&gt;</span>
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">ul</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Added <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"tests/prettify_test.html#PHP"</span>&gt;</span>tests<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span> for PHP support
        to address 
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"http://code.google.com/p/google-code-prettify/issues/detail?id=3"</span>
       &gt;</span>issue 3<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>.
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Fixed
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"http://code.google.com/p/google-code-prettify/issues/detail?id=6"</span>
       &gt;</span>bug<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>: <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>prettyPrintOne<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span> was not halting.  This was not
        reachable through the normal entry point.
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Fixed
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"http://code.google.com/p/google-code-prettify/issues/detail?id=4"</span>
       &gt;</span>bug<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>: recursing into a script block or PHP tag that was not properly
        closed would not silently drop the content.
        (<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"tests/prettify_test.html#issue4"</span>&gt;</span>test<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>)
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Fixed
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"http://code.google.com/p/google-code-prettify/issues/detail?id=8"</span>
       &gt;</span>bug<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>: was eating tabs
        (<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"tests/prettify_test.html#issue8"</span>&gt;</span>test<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>)
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Fixed entity handling so that the caveat
        <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">blockquote</span>&gt;</span>
          <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>Caveats: please properly escape less-thans.  <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">tt</span>&gt;</span>x&amp;amp;lt;y<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">tt</span>&gt;</span>
          instead of <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">tt</span>&gt;</span>x&amp;lt;y<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">tt</span>&gt;</span>, and use <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">tt</span>&gt;</span>&amp;quot;<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">tt</span>&gt;</span> instead of 
          <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">tt</span>&gt;</span>&amp;amp;quot;<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">tt</span>&gt;</span> for string delimiters.<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">p</span>&gt;</span>
        <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">blockquote</span>&gt;</span>
        is no longer applicable.
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Added noisefree's C#
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"http://code.google.com/p/google-code-prettify/issues/detail?id=4"</span>
       &gt;</span>patch<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Added a <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"http://google-code-prettify.googlecode.com/files/prettify-small.zip"</span>&gt;</span>distribution<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span> that has comments and
        whitespace removed to reduce download size from 45.5kB to 12.8kB.

      of a <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>lang-&amp;lt;language-file-extension&amp;gt;<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span><span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>

    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">ul</span>&gt;</span>

      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Language handlers for F#, OCAML, SQL<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Support for <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>nocode<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span> spans to allow embedding of line
      numbers and code annotations which should not be styled or otherwise
      affect the tokenization of prettified code.
      See the issue 22
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"tests/prettify_test.html#issue22"</span>&gt;</span>testcase<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>.<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">code</span>&gt;</span>

    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">ul</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Language handlers for Visual Basic, Haskell, CSS, and WikiText<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Added <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">tt</span>&gt;</span>.mxml<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">tt</span>&gt;</span> extension to the markup style handler for
        Flex <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MXML"</span>&gt;</span>MXML files<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>.  See
        <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span>

        &gt;</span>issue 37<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>.
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Added <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">tt</span>&gt;</span>.m<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">tt</span>&gt;</span> extension to the C style handler so that Objective
        C source files properly highlight.  See
        <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span>
        <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"http://code.google.com/p/google-code-prettify/issues/detail?id=58"</span>
       &gt;</span>issue 58<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>.
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Changed HTML lexer to use the same embedded source mechanism as the
        wiki language handler, and changed to use the registered
        CSS handler for STYLE element content.
    <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">ul</span>&gt;</span>

        See <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">a</span> <span class="hljs-attr">href</span>=<span class="hljs-string">"http://mikesamuel.blogspot.com/2009/05/efficient-parsing-in-javascript.html"</span>&gt;</span>benchmarks<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">a</span>&gt;</span>.<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
      <span class="hljs-tag">&lt;<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>Fixed bugs with highlighting of Haskell line comments, Lisp

        newlines in Wiki code on Windows, and newlines in IE6.<span class="hljs-tag">&lt;/<span class="hljs-name">li</span>&gt;</span>
